author: cnbc.com
title: Lennox International Increases Dividend 25 Percent
text:
DALLAS, May 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The board of directors of Lennox International Inc. (NYSE: LII) voted to increase the quarterly cash dividend 25 percent to $0.64 per share of common stock. The dividend is payable on July 13, 2018, to stockholders of record as of June 29, 2018.
Lennox International Inc. is a global leader in the heating, air conditioning, and refrigeration markets. Lennox International Inc. stock is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and traded under the symbol "LII".
Contact: Steve Harrison, Vice President, Investor Relations of Lennox International Inc., 972-497-6670.
